description: This file defines the MessageRepository interface, which is a Spring Data JPA repository for the Message entity, providing methods to query messages by conversation ID and creation time.

classes.name: MessageRepository
classes.description: Repository interface for Message entity, providing custom query methods for retrieving messages based on conversation ID and timestamp.

methods.name: findByConversationIdOrderByCreatedAtAsc
methods.description: Fetches all Message objects associated with the specified conversation ID, ordered by creation time ascending.

methods.name: findByConversationIdAndCreatedAtAfterOrderByCreatedAtAsc
methods.description: Retrieves a paginated list of Message objects for the specified conversation ID created after a given timestamp, ordered ascending.
